original: 雖然水軍仍控制著漢水，但關羽軍的家屬多在江陵，得知江陵失陷，軍心潰散，士兵奔逃。關羽兵敗後，向西退守麥城。
text: Although the navy still controlled the Hanshui River, most of Guan Yu's family members were in Jiangling. When they learned that Jiangling had fallen, the army was disintegrated and the soldiers fled. After Guan Yu was defeated, he retreated westward to defend Maicheng.
